Headline: #96 Lunt Temporary Reroute at Touhy/California
ShortDescription: 96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Touhy, Western and Lunt: due to, Construction near Touhy/California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Touhy, Western and Lunt, due to construction near Touhy/California.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Midway-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Midway-bound Orange Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Pulaski. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Midway-bound Orange Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Pulaski.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
